Atrium_Table_1.name: Atrium
Atrium_Table_1.info: Students have the opportunity to gather in the Atrium in small groups for casual meetings or discussions.

LobbyShop.name: Gateway Gifts
LobbyShop.info: Students will discover a wealth of options at the Gateway Gifts, where they can find an extensive selection of items.

Kitchen_Worktop_Hobs__1_.name: Kitchen
Kitchen_Worktop_Hobs__1_.info: The kitchen proudly holds a top-tier level 5 hygiene rating, ensuring the highest standards of cleanliness and food safety.
